TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit MicrosoftIdentityWebApiAuthenticationBuilderExtensions extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Extensions for for startup initialization of web APIs.

MemberSignature.Value: public static Microsoft.Identity.Web.MicrosoftIdentityWebApiAuthenticationBuilderWithConfiguration AddMicrosoftIdentityWebApi (this Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.AuthenticationBuilder builder, Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfigurationSection configurationSection, string jwtBearerScheme = "Bearer", bool subscribeToJwtBearerMiddlewareDiagnosticsEvents = false);

.method public static hidebysig class Microsoft.Identity.Web.MicrosoftIdentityWebApiAuthenticationBuilderWithConfiguration AddMicrosoftIdentityWebApi(class Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.AuthenticationBuilder builder, class Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfigurationSection configurationSection, string jwtBearerScheme, bool subscribeToJwtBearerMiddlewareDiagnosticsEvents) cil managed

<Extension()> Public Function AddMicrosoftIdentityWebApi (builder As AuthenticationBuilder, configurationSection As IConfigurationSection, Optional jwtBearerScheme As String = "Bearer", Optional subscribeToJwtBearerMiddlewareDiagnosticsEvents As Boolean = false) As MicrosoftIdentityWebApiAuthenticationBuilderWithConfiguration

Docs.param: The to which to add this configuration.
The configuration second from which to fill-in the options.
The JWT bearer scheme name to be used. By default it uses "Bearer".
Set to true if you want to debug, or just understand the JWT bearer events.
Docs.summary: Protects the web API with Microsoft identity platform (formerly Azure AD v2.0). This method expects the configuration file will have a section, named "AzureAd" as default, with the necessary settings to initialize authentication options.
